name: Monster Party Demo DarkTober 2018 Game Jam
name_original: Monster Party Demo DarkTober 2018 Game Jam
description: Set in a fantasy world where all kinds of horrible monsters exist, you have been hired as a bodyguard at a Halloween party,  the loud music and people attract a lot of unwanted attention, and due to all the costumes you're struggling to tell who is a party-goer and who is a bloodthirsty monster! It would be a lot less pressure if you weren't ordered to kill on the spot...
